text: Preobrazhenskoye () is a rural locality (a selo) in Beloselskoye Rural Settlement of Krasnogvardeysky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 1469 as of 2018. There are 19 streets. == Geography == The village is located 6.5 km south-east from Krasnogvardeyskoye. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Preobrazhenskoye, Republic of Adygea
